label.description: You have successfully completed a course of post-secondary higher education of at least three years' duration, as well as the professional training which may be required in addition to that post secondary course.

In a Member state where post-secondary higher education of at least three years is the normal requirement, you are recognised and permitted to practise as a qualified school teacher, having undertaken some lesser education and training in such a State (
You are recognised in an EEA state by virtue of qualifications obtained outside of the EEA and have three years' certified professional experience in that state.
